abstract: Who’s benefiting from the woes at Morgan Stanley and Goldman Sachs? Apparently JPMorgan Chase, for one.
lead_paragraph: Who’s benefiting from the woes at Morgan Stanley and Goldman Sachs? Apparently JPMorgan Chase, for one.

headline.main: JPMorgan’s Prime Brokerage Is Said to Be Reaping Clients

abstract: A cold war appears to have broken out between JPMorgan Chase and Citadel Investment Group, as the giant Chicago hedge fund poaches trading staff from the banking colossus amid the credit crisis.
snippet: A cold war appears to have broken out between JPMorgan Chase and Citadel Investment Group, as the giant Chicago hedge fund poaches trading staff from the banking colossus amid the credit crisis.
lead_paragraph: A cold war appears to have broken out between JPMorgan Chase and Citadel Investment Group, as the giant Chicago hedge fund poaches trading staff from the banking colossus amid the credit crisis.
